title: The minimum 60% of the required LOS shall be provided exclusively on the ground and at least 50% of this shall be provided on mother earth to facilitate the percolation of water and balance 40% of required LOS may be provided on podium area extending beyond the building line
clause_text: The minimum 60% of the required LOS shall be provided exclusively on the ground and at least 50% of this shall be provided on mother earth to facilitate the percolation of water and balance 40% of required LOS may be provided on podium area extending beyond the building line. The LOS on mother earth shall not be paved and all LOS shall be accessible to all the occupants of the plot/layout.
section: LOS in industrial plots/layout of industrial plots in any industrial plot admeasuring 1000 sq. m or more in area, 15 per cent of the total area shall be provided as LOS subject to:
